title: Which PC should I buy in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: All new gaming desktop with HIGH QUALITY gaming EXPERIENCE 60 fps product name ASUS ROG Strix GA15 G15DH-IN008T Gaming Desktop Comes with one of the AMD’s best processor Ryzen 5 3600x/8 gigabyte of ram /512GB NVMe SSD/Windows 10/4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Graphics You can buy this product on amazon ASUS ROG Strix GA15 G15DH-IN008T Gaming Desktop (AMD Ryzen 5-3600X/8GB RAM/512GB NVMe SSD/Windows 10/4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Graphics), Star Black: Amazon.in: Computers & Accessories by the way i also use this pc for a while time of period it give me very best gaming and video editing experience i was play cyberpunk 2077 game on 60+ FPS and on ex stream graphic Have a Wonderful Day

I highly recommend everyone that isn't comfortable building a PC themselves look at BLD - Custom Gaming PCs by NZXT. They use off the shelf components (meaning you could built the exact same PCs they offer, no proprietary or hard to find components are used), they are fairly priced- only charging a $100 build fee, all PCs are built to order, they are guaranteed to perform within 10% of what they quote and they build and ship it in I believe 48 hours. The only downsides are they charge MSRP so no sales pricing, they dont have all brands so if you want say a Corsair PSU or case- sorry they dont carry Corsair and they only use their brand for cases and water cooling. They are good products, just some people might want a different brand.
